app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: Additional files: Table S1. Primers used for genetic modifications. Table S2. Genebank ID and sequences of enzymes used in this study. Figure S1. All recombinant plasmid maps utilized in this work. Figure S2. Nile Red staining of wild strains (A) and engineered strains (B). Figure S3. GC of intracellular methyl esters. (a) Wild strain Y. lipolytica ATCC20460, (b) Recombinant bacteria pWX020, (c) Recombinant bacteria pWX030, and (d) Recombinant bacteria pWX034.
